reviewText:
Fun, class, songs, dance, ... all that you can enjoy is in this collection ot videos.
So good. I recommend it.

I have never laughed so hard in my life!  I watch the dvds over and over and they never get old. The comedy sketches are hysterical.  The music is wonderful!  Dean Martin is a born entertainer!  I recommend this dvd set to anyone and everyone.  You will not regret buying these dvds!!!!
